identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a visceral, neon-drenched retail lottery experience that feels like a cyberpunk game, not a spreadsheet.

heading.name: Space Grotesk
heading.usage: All headings (h1-h6). Use weight 700 for impact, 300 for elegance.

mono.name: JetBrains Mono
mono.usage: Receipt data, transaction IDs, coordinates, analytics numbers.

rules: Overlines (e.g., 'RECEIPT ID') must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs.

borders.instruction: Use 1px borders with 10-20% opacity white. On hover, brighten border to 40%.

textures.noise: Add a fixed noise overlay at 2% opacity to the body background to kill digital flatness.

customer_app.description: Mobile-first. Cards stack vertically. Bottom navigation bar floats. Big, thumb-friendly touch targets.

admin_dashboard.description: Dense Bento Grid. Map background is persistent. Data widgets float over the map.

buttons.style: Pill-shaped for Customer, Sharp/Rounded-md for Admin.
buttons.classes: rounded-full font-bold tracking-wide shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(139,92,246,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(139,92,246,0.5)] transition-all duration-300

cards.classes: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 hover:border-white/10 transition-colors

inputs.classes: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-0 rounded-lg h-12

hero_background.desc: Neon city night retail vibe for login/landing background.

receipt_instruction.desc: Close up of hand holding receipt for upload instruction.

win_celebration.desc: Gold confetti on black for the 'You Won' screen.

retail_interior.desc: Luxury retail context for shop details.

guidelines: Use 'spring' physics for all interactions (stiffness: 400, damping: 30).
Stagger children animations for lists (0.05s delay).
Page transitions: Slide up + Fade In.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links to index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Neon Void' color palette defined above. Extend the theme, do not overwrite.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Update index.css to set the root variables for the dark theme. Ensure body has 'bg-background text-foreground'.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, strip the default 'border-border' if it conflicts with the 'Glassmorphism' style. Use 'border-white/10' instead.
5. MAPS: Use a dark mode map style (e.g., CartoDB Dark Matter or Mapbox Dark) for the geospatial views.
6. NO WHITE BACKGROUNDS: Ensure no component defaults to bg-white. Force bg-card or bg-black/90.
7. USE SONNER: For all notifications (Upload success, Win alert).
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
